author: Flexx
content:
This is among my favorites of your pictures so far, thus I am very glad your first POTD for that day didn't work out and made you go out again to shoot this one.

One simply has to wonder thats behind that glass, and the possibilities are endless. Noooo! I'm not going to tell you what I had in mind! ðŸ˜‰

Thanks for sharing,
Flexx
